extendedInfo.description: Mehndi Design:"Mehndi designs android app" -  a must for a trendy women's Make up kit !!! Mehendi is a natural dye from tropical plant leaves. Mehndi designs are used as a temporary tattoo for hands and feet of women during Festivals and Wedding occasions in Indian Culture, also catching up with the west. Trending with the trends we have a range of beautiful, traditional, glamorous and intricate mehendi designs for party, festivals and traditional occasions in one single android app "Mehendi Designs". This app has four broad categories of mehendi designs, Marwadi, Arabic, Bridal and traditional. With each of the categories having numerous designs for both hands and feet. The designs are unique with great options from cluttered designs to minimal floral. So, download this Mehendi designs app and get tattooed with your choice of Mehndi style. Whether you a bride today or a model diva, traditional house wife or a party animal, this app is a single mehendi art solution for a multicultural women of today.About the Mehendi App:â¢	A great collection of traditional and fashionable mehendi designsâ¢	Marwadi Mehendi designs, Arabic Mehendi designs, Traditional Mehendi designs and of course bridal designsâ¢	Mehendi designs of bride with full hands and feet designsâ¢	Simple designs to cluttered designs, all in one app.â¢	A great boon for ladies searching out for a new design each time the indulge in mehndiâ¢	This app will be regularly updated with the latest designs to keep you in-trend.Keywords:Mehndi designs, mehndi art, mehndi designs for hands, mehndi designs for women, dulhan mehndi design, traditional mehndi design, bridal mehndi design.
